column4: why is the battery status icon changing when I unplug and replug my power cable?
because it detects that you have changed power source
sorry, i meant why is it NOT changing
i knwo it should be
just check tooltip message over icon
if it says that AC Power on when cable is plugged, everything is ok
honesly I don't know if icon should be changing in Edgy
but when i remove it, it still says it's plugged in...
that's not good
seems like ACPI reporting problems
i got that impression
acpid is started/running
it is definetly a bug, so you propably should report it
what kind of laptop, model, vendor?
hp compaq nc8430, and it worked fine in beta3
and i don't really know how to submit bug reports and such
did you dist-upgrade or clean install?
this time it was clean off the dvd
hmmmm, beta 3 also was clean install, I presume?
yes
ok, I will check out if bug system doesn't have reported already this one
thanks
you could do a "dmesg > dmesg.txt", open dmesg.txt in gedit, copy it, and paste it in www.pastebin.com, and then give me url it will give you
right
